fields.label: Description
fields.description: Custom description to help identify this account

fields.label: Account Name From Bank
fields.description: Account type/name as provided by the bank (e.g. Kontokorrent, Darlehen, Termineinlage)

fields.label: IBAN
fields.description: International Bank Account Number

fields.label: Bank Code
fields.description: German bank code (BLZ - Bankleitzahl)

fields.label: Available Balance
fields.description: Available balance for transactions

fields.label: Balance
fields.description: Current account balance

fields.label: Sub Account
fields.description: Sub-account identifier if applicable

fields.label: Customer Number
fields.description: Bank customer number

fields.label: Account Number
fields.description: Traditional bank account number

fields.label: Account Holder
fields.description: Name of the account holder

fields.label: Currency
fields.description: Account currency (e.g. EUR)

fields.label: Balance Date
fields.description: Date of the last balance update

fields.label: Hibiscus ID
fields.description: Internal account ID in Hibiscus server

fields.label: BIC
fields.description: Bank Identifier Code (SWIFT code)

fields.label: Hibiscus Comment
fields.description: Comment stored in Hibiscus for this account

fields.label: Accent Color 1
fields.description: Primary gradient color for dashboard display

fields.label: Accent Color 2
fields.description: Secondary gradient color for dashboard display

fields.label: Text Color
fields.description: Text color on gradient background (Auto detects based on background brightness)

fields.label: Sort Order
fields.description: Display order in dashboard widget (lower numbers appear first)

fields.label: ERPNext Account Type
fields.description: Set to 'Account' when ERPNext is installed

fields.label: ERPNext Account
fields.description: Link to the corresponding ERPNext bank account

fields.label: Auto Fetch Transactions
fields.description: When enabled, transactions are automatically fetched hourly

fields.label: Permitted Users
fields.description: Users who can access this bank account

fields.label: Permitted Roles
fields.description: All users with these roles can access this bank account
